Sentencas: The electro-oxidation behaviour of ash-free coal (AFC) was investigated by comparing biomass carbon and conventional hydrogen fuel.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: A coin-type direct carbon fuel cell (DCFC) based on molten carbonate fuel cell (MCFC) technology was employed.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The investigation was carried out into active gas species in the anode, the fuel to carbonate ratio, gasification behaviour, and so on.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical methods of steady state polarization and step chronopotentiometry were used, and chemical methods, thermogravimetric analysis (TGA), and gas analysis with gas chromatography were also employed.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The cells were operated at a fixed temperature of 850 degrees C, and their conditions were initially checked by hydrogen fuel.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The cell performance of AFC was similar to carbon fuel but inferior to H-2 fuel at 150 mA cm(-2).
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The oxidation of AFC was progressed via the gasification of coal by heat, similar to carbon fuel.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: But the AFC showed H-2 and CO as major gas species in the anode, a different gas species than carbon fuel which had only CO as a main gas species.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the gasification temperature of AFC was much lower than that of carbon fuel, indicating that the AFC fuel can reduce the operational temperature below that of the carbon fuel, down to at least 700 degrees C. Copyright (C) 2015, Hydrogen Energy Publications, LLC.
Titulo: Oxidation of ash-free coal in a direct carbon fuel cell
